mapper.select: SELECT comp_seq , comp_name , corp_reg_num , comp_reg_num , comp_stat , DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS reg_dt , comp_manage , comp_type , comp_sector , comp_cat , comp_zcode , comp_addr1 , comp_addr2 , comp_addr3 , comp_phone , comp_email , comp_fax , comp_id , reg_id , reg_ip , comp_addr4 FROM EMI_COMP_INFO

SELECT comp_seq , comp_name , corp_reg_num , comp_reg_num , comp_stat , DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS reg_dt , comp_manage , comp_type , comp_sector , comp_cat , comp_zcode , comp_addr1 , comp_addr2 , comp_addr3 , comp_phone , comp_email , comp_fax , comp_id , reg_id , reg_ip , comp_addr4 FROM EMI_COMP_INFO WHERE object_id = #{object_id}

SELECT a.comp_seq , a.comp_name , a.corp_reg_num , a.comp_reg_num , a.comp_stat , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS reg_dt , a.comp_manage , a.comp_type , a.comp_sector , a.comp_cat , a.comp_zcode , a.comp_addr1 , a.comp_addr2 , a.comp_addr3 , a.comp_phone , a.comp_email , a.comp_fax , a.comp_id , a.reg_id , INET_NTOA(a.reg_ip) as reg_ip , a.comp_addr4 FROM EMI_COMP_INFO a INNER JOIN EMI_USER_INFO b ON (a.comp_seq = b.comp_seq) WHERE b.user_seq = #{user_seq}
